name: Snuggle Bunnies
description:
Organize a pile of bunnies into a comfortable snuggle.

Bunnies will shiver when they don't feel safe, try to make help.

Bunnies will get too warm and sweat if they're surrounded.

If you organize them well a Bunnie will feel loved enough and shower you with that love that you can use to buy more Bunnies to add to the pile.

This version of the game has some issues with conveyance, so once I beat Kingdom Hearts 3 and come back to this I'll make it clearer what each Bunnie does while the player is holding them.

If you've got any suggestions (especially if you can think of a way to make it look less like it's actually an orgy) I'm happy to hear them on either Twitter or E-Mail.
